websites.title: List of Websites
websites.description: Provide an array of websites to scrape for emails.

removeDuplicateEmails.title: Remove Duplicate Emails
removeDuplicateEmails.description: If enabled, removes duplicate emails even if found on seaparate webpages. If disabled, outputs all found emails including duplicates.

maxDepth.title: Maximum Crawl Depth
maxDepth.description: Maximum depth of pages to crawl from the starting URL. A depth of 0 means only the initial page, 1 means also crawl linked pages, etc.

maxSpray.title: Maximum Links per Page
maxSpray.description: Maximum number of additional links to follow from each page.
